Previous Directors of DATA 198: Introduction to Real World Data Science

Created by Brandon Lee Concepcion

Ever wondered who the previous Directors of Academic Development were? Here they are!

😩 Brandon Concepcion

Fall 2024

Brandon is a Data Science and Computer Science double major. He loves photography, swimming, going to the gym, and watching movies. He is also the creator of dssdecal.org!

🎮 Lynn Chien

Fall 2024

Lynn will graduate in 2026 as a Data Science and Cognitive Science student from Las Vegas, Nevada. She loves eating, sleeping, playing League of Legends ARAM, art, and playing poker!

🧍🏻‍♂️ Ryan Stevenson

Fall 2024

Ryan is an Industrial Engineering and Operations Research student who is also minoring in Data Science. Ryan actually took the DeCal as a student, and his hobbies include being active (soccer/volleyball/climbing), as well as maximizing shareholder value

🏀 James Geronimo

Spring 2024

James is a member of the class of 2026, studying Computer Science and Data Science. Outside of school, he enjoys hooping at the RSF and dabbling in competitive video games.

🏋️ Joseph Zhai

Spring 2024

Joseph is a member of the class of 2025 but he joined DSS during the Spring 2023 semester. He’s from San Diego and is a loyal servant to Siddharth Ramshankar

📸 Steven Zeng

Spring 2024

Steven will graduate in 2026 as a Data Science and Environmental Science major. He’s from Texas and loves hikes, photography, and going to the gym.

🎨 Aarthi Kannan

Fall 2023

Graduating in 2025, Aarthi is a Computer Science and Cognitive Science student from Fremont, California. She loves to paint, crochet, try new recipes, and go on day trips!

🇮🇩 Austin Ardisaputra

Fall 2023

Austin is an international student from Indonesia. He studies Computer Science and Economics and will graduate in 2025. He has also been a Vice President of Culture and Vice President of Tech for DSS

🍺 Ethan Chien

Fall 2023

Ethan graduated in 2024, and in his free time loves to play basketball, swim, go to Raleigh’s, and listen to music!

🎶 Manas Khatore

Spring 2023

Manas is a current Senior majoring in Data Science and Computer Science. He enjoys music and concerts.

🧀 Paul Jacobs

Spring 2023

Paul is from Cincinnati, Ohio, and graduated from Cal in 2024. He joined DSS as part of the General Membership program and outside of school, he likes hiking, making charcuterie boards, and playing around on photoshop.

🗻 Suparna Kompalli

Spring 2023

Suparna is a Computer Science and Data Science major who will graduate in 2025. In her free time, she loves to explore nature, listen to music, eat food, and do just about any form of art. She has also served as the Vice President of Culture for the DSS.

🗽 Bella Chang

Fall 2022

Bella is a current M.S. Data Science student at New York University and has also been a Social Good project manager for DSS

2️⃣ Paul Jacobs

Fall 2022

Paul was a 2️⃣ time Director of Acaemic Development. Some of his favorite artists are 100 Gecs, Nirvana, and Grimes.

🃏 Stephen Liu

Fall 2022

Stephen is a current Quantitative Trader for RBC Capital Markets. He graduated from Cal in 2024 as a Data Science and Business Economics major.

📈 Angeline Lee

Spring 2022

Angeline graduated from Cal in 2024 as a Computer Science and Statistics major. She has also been a former President and VP of Marketing for DSS

👸 Pranati Modumudi

Spring 2022

Pranati is a current Data Scientist at Disney Media and Entertainment Distribution. She graduated from UC Berkeley as a Data Science and Economics double major.

🍜 Savvy Streitman

Spring 2022

Savvy joined the Data Science Society in the Fall 2021 semester and loves the outdoors, dogs, and Toss Noodles.

🏐 Marlon Fu

Fall 2021

Marlon is a Master’s in Data Science student at Berkeley. He also serves as a TA for DATASCI 200 and was also the President of DSS in the Fall 2022 semester.

🐼 Michelle Li

Fall 2021

Michelle studied Computer Science + Data Science with a minor in Education! She is originally from Maryland and has also held positions as a Vice President of Technology for DSS, and Teaching Assistant for Data 100. She is a big fan of Taylor Swift, running, Trader Joes, and true crime podcasts.

🧳 Arnav Patel

Spring 2021

Arnav graduated in 2023 as a Data Science and Business double major and now works at BAIN as an Associate Consultant Intern. In the past, he has served as the president of DSS. He also enjoys Pokémon and hiking.

⌚ Atharva Mehendale

Spring 2021

Atharva is a current Senior Specialist, Product Manager at Salesforce. He is a co-founder of Product Space at Berkeley, and also served as the Vice President of Marketing for DSS

🧠 Sabrina Wu

Spring 2021

Sabrina graduated from Cal in 2023 as a Cognitive Science major. She has also held positions in DSS as the Vice President of Marketing, as well as the Vice President of Culture.

🧑‍🔬 Alleana Clark

Fall 2020

Alleanna is a former President of the Data Science Society! She studied Data Science and Human and Population Health during her time at Berkeley.

👨‍⚕️ Roshan Lodha

Fall 2020

Roshan is a Cal computer science and biochemisty alum currently studying medicine at the Cleveland Clinic

Stephanie Lu

🐟 Tanvee Desai

Spring 2020

Tanvee is a current Senior Data Scientist at Barracuda. Graduating in 2020, she studied Data Science and Computer Science at UC Berkeley.
